item.title: Test Post 1
item.description: Hello world. library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.1 ── ## ✔ ggplot2 3.3.6 ✔ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✔ tibble 3.1.8 ✔ dplyr 1.0.9 ## ✔ tidyr 1.2.0 ✔ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✔ readr 2.1.1 ✔ forcats 0.5.1 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() seatshare <- read.csv("seatshare.csv") seatshare <- seatshare %>% mutate(Congress = parse_number(Congress)) ggplot(seatshare, aes(x = Congress)) + geom_line(aes(y = Democrats), color = "blue3") + geom_line(aes(y = Republicans), color = "red2") seatshare_long <- seatshare %>% select(Congress, Democrats, Republicans) %>% gather(key = Party, value = Seats, -Congress) seatshare_long ## Congress Party Seats ## 1 80 Democrats 188 ## 2 81 Democrats 263 ## 3 82 Democrats 234 ## 4 83 Democrats 213 ## 5 84 Democrats 232 ## 6 85 Democrats 234 ## 7 86 Democrats 283 ## 8 87 Democrats 262 ## 9 88 Democrats 258 ## 10 89 Democrats 295 ## 11 90 Democrats 248 ## 12 91 Democrats 243 ## 13 92 Democrats 255 ## 14 93 Democrats 242 ## 15 94 Democrats 291 ## 16 95 Democrats 292 ## 17 96 Democrats 277 ## 18 97 Democrats 242 ## 19 98 Democrats 269 ## 20 99 Democrats 253 ## 21 100 Democrats 258 ## 22 101 Democrats 260 ## 23 102 Democrats 267 ## 24 103 Democrats 258 ## 25 104 Democrats 204 ## 26 105 Democrats 207 ## 27 106 Democrats 211 ## 28 107 Democrats 212 ## 29 108 Democrats 204 ## 30 109 Democrats 202 ## 31 110 Democrats 233 ## 32 111 Democrats 256 ## 33 112 Democrats 193 ## 34 113 Democrats 200 ## 35 114 Democrats 188 ## 36 115 Democrats 194 ## 37 116 Democrats 235 ## 38 117 Democrats 222 ## 39 80 Republicans 246 ## 40 81 Republicans 171 ## 41 82 Republicans 199 ## 42 83 Republicans 221 ## 43 84 Republicans 203 ## 44 85 Republicans 201 ## 45 86 Republicans 153 ## 46 87 Republicans 175 ## 47 88 Republicans 176 ## 48 89 Republicans 140 ## 49 90 Republicans 187 ## 50 91 Republicans 192 ## 51 92 Republicans 180 ## 52 93 Republicans 192 ## 53 94 Republicans 144 ## 54 95 Republicans 143 ## 55 96 Republicans 158 ## 56 97 Republicans 192 ## 57 98 Republicans 166 ## 58 99 Republicans 182 ## 59 100 Republicans 177 ## 60 101 Republicans 175 ## 61 102 Republicans 167 ## 62 103 Republicans 176 ## 63 104 Republicans 230 ## 64 105 Republicans 226 ## 65 106 Republicans 223 ## 66 107 Republicans 221 ## 67 108 Republicans 229 ## 68 109 Republicans 232 ## 69 110 Republicans 202 ## 70 111 Republicans 178 ## 71 112 Republicans 242 ## 72 113 Republicans 234 ## 73 114 Republicans 247 ## 74 115 Republicans 241 ## 75 116 Republicans 199 ## 76 117 Republicans 212 ggplot(seatshare_long, aes(x = Congress, y = Seats, col = Party)) + geom_line() + scale_color_manual(values=c('red3','blue2'))
